item.title: About
item.description: Education My name is Manju Kuah and I’m a senior undergraduate computer science major at Oregon State University. I am currently in the applied cybersecurity track for CS. After completing key computer science courses I now have 4 years experience in C/C++, Python, x86 Assembly and HTML/CSS/Javascript. Key cybersecurity courses I have completed include: Network Security authentication protocols, group key establishment and management, trusted intermediaries, public key infrastructures, SSL/TLS, IPSec, firewalls and intrusion detection Computer Networks

item.title: Projects
item.description: ORTSOC Infrastructure This project was part of my senior capstone at Oregon State University.My team and I designed and implemented security infrastructure for The Oregon Research and Teaching Security Operations Center (ORTSOC). The ORTSOC is a learning SOC for students that provides security operations for small organizations that may not be able to afford the services of a well-known or established SOC. This infrastructure uses the Elastic Stack, nginx, wireguard, BIND9 and other components which create the foundation of the infrastructure.
